thread.title: Kerry: U.S. And Russia Finalize Deal To Reduce Violence In Syria - Nation
thread.title_full: Kerry: U.S. And Russia Finalize Deal To Reduce Violence In Syria - Fox Nation

author: Budapests
text:
Isn't this exactly what Trump has been saying to do for over a year and has been demeaned and degraded and scandalized by the liberal media for suggesting such a thing?

People, I am telling you this from the bottom of my heart....if Clinton wins this election America will die. It will die. 
SHE WANTS TO BE THE FIRST WOMAN PRESIDENT. PERIOD and she will do ANYTHING to achieve that goal, as she really believes she DESERVES it.
Obama has all but completely killed the face of this nation. It's culture and its heritage by drowning us in unsustainable debt, refusing to enforce our immigration and border laws, allowing millions of INVADERS to enter our nation and become squatters, and dividing Black American from White Americans every chance he had the list goes on Clinton will continue the implosion of destroying our nation from the inside out. She's George Soros last hope to control our nation, he OWNS her.
